S04bsu031_u:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ /
S04bsu031_u:4: athāyuṣmān śāriputro yena maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya caṃkramaḥ, tenopasamakramīt /
S04bsu031_u:5: upasaṃkramya anyonyaṃ saṃmodanīyāṃ kathāṃ bahuvidhāṃ vyatisārayitvā ubhau śilātale upāviśatām //
S04bsu031_u:6_0: athāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - adyātra śālistambamavalokya
S04bsu031_u:6_1: maitreya bhagavatā bhikṣubhyaḥ sūtramidamuktam - yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
S04bsu031_u:8: yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu031_u:16_0: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat -
S04bsu031_u:16_1: atra yaduktaṃ bhadanta śāriputra bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena - yo bhikṣavaḥ
S04bsu031_u:18: yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati iti, tatra katamaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma?
S04bsu031_u:19: pratītyasamutpādo nāma yadidam - asmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate /
S04bsu031_u:31: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:43: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:46: tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ /
S04bsu031_u:47: ayamukto bhagavatā āryāṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ phalalābhanirvāṇaikasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ //
S04bsu031_u:52: ihoktaṃ bhagavatā - ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitam,
S04bsu031_u:60: sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyayaḥ, tasmāt pratītyasamutpāda ityucyate /
S04bsu031_u:62_0: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā yāvadyaiṣā dharmatā
S04bsu031_u:62_1: dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā pratītyasamutpādasamatā tathatā aviparītatathatā ananyatathatā
S04bsu031_u:63: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
S04bsu031_u:66: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamāḥ? yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ /
S04bsu031_u:75: asati bīje aṅkuro na bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:76: sati tu bīje aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati, evaṃ yāvat sati puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S04bsu031_u:78: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
S04bsu031_u:79: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:81: atha punaḥ bīje sati aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:82: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:84: kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnā samudāyāt /
S04bsu031_u:97: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karomḥti /
S04bsu031_u:98: evamabdhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ snehayāmḥti /
S04bsu031_u:99: tejodhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ paripācayāmḥti /
S04bsu031_u:101: ākāśadhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomḥti /
S04bsu031_u:102: ṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomḥti /
S04bsu031_u:103: bḥjasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ (aṅkuraṃ?) abhinirvartayāmḥti /
S04bsu031_u:104: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita (ŚālSū, Vaidya 102) iti /
S04bsu031_u:105: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu pratyayeṣu bḥje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttiebhavati /
S04bsu031_u:107: sa ca aṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto (na caikakāraṇādhḥno)
S04bsu031_u:109: atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātusamavāyād bḥje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S04bsu031_u:118: kathaṃ na śāśvatata iti? yasmādanyo 'ṅkuraḥ anyadbījam /
S04bsu031_u:119: na ca ya evāṅkuraḥ tadeva bījam /
S04bsu031_u:123: kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhād bījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate /
S04bsu031_u:125: api ca bījaṃ ca nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye aṅkura utpadyate tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /
S04bsu031_u:127: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura iti /
S04bsu031_u:132: kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate, tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayatīti /
S04bsu031_u:143: tatra avidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:144: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati - vayamavidyayā abhinirvatitā iti /
S04bsu031_u:145: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:150: kathamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
S04bsu031_u:152: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:154: yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
S04bsu031_u:156: yaṃ kāyasya aśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati, (ŚālSū, Vaidya 103) ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ /
S04bsu031_u:157: yaṃ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ /
S04bsu031_u:167: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:168: abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya anuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:169: tejodhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya aśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:170: vāyudhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:173: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
S04bsu031_u:174: atha ca satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattirbhavati //
S04bsu031_u:175: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantuḥ na manajo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit /
S04bsu031_u:176_1: na jantuḥ na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na
S04bsu031_u:178_0: yā eṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāmekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
S04bsu031_u:182: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī(avidyāpratyayāḥ) saṃskārā ityucyante /
S04bsu031_u:185: rūpaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni tāni copādāya rūpam /
S04bsu031_u:200: ye cāpi anye evamādayaḥ kleśāḥ, te upāyāsā iti //
S04bsu031_u:220: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante - puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
S04bsu031_u:221: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:231: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
S04bsu031_u:233: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
S04bsu031_u:237: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
S04bsu031_u:243: na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'pravartate nadīsrotavat //
S04bsu031_u:245: na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat,
S04bsu031_u:246: atha ca imānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
S04bsu031_u:247: katamāni catvāri? yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
S04bsu031_u:256: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:257: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:258: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
S04bsu031_u:260: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ virohati /
S04bsu031_u:262: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto (ŚālSū, Vaidya 105)
S04bsu031_u:263: neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
S04bsu031_u:264: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogadṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāt tatra tatra āsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījamupapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
S04bsu031_u:265: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
S04bsu031_u:268: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
S04bsu031_u:279: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:280: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya ālambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:281: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:282: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:283: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhārakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S04bsu031_u:285: atha ca punaḥ satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati /
S04bsu031_u:290: na ca tatra ādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati /
S04bsu031_u:295: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'bhyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu031_u:296: na ca candramaṇḍalaṃ tasmātsthānāccyutam, parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu031_u:302: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatra upapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
S04bsu031_u:303: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
S04bsu031_u:312: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ (ŚālSū, Vaidya 106)
S04bsu031_u:313: skandhāḥ, na tu ya evaṃ māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
S04bsu031_u:315: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
S04bsu031_u:318: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti, nāpyaniruddheṣu /
S04bsu031_u:320: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /
S04bsu031_u:322: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti /
S04bsu031_u:327: kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate /
S04bsu031_u:330_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītamevaṃ
S04bsu031_u:331: asataḥ tucchataḥ riktataḥ asārataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ aghataḥ anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyataḥ anātmataḥ samanupaśyati,

S04bsu031_u:345: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi //
